summary: A results-driven professional with experience in technology and infrastructure. Passionate about building systems that scale and sharing knowledge with others.

roles.title: Systems Engineer
highlights: Leading end-to-end modernization and migration of mission-critical SCADA systems from Windows Server 2008 to 2022, coordinating 5+ departments and 4 external vendors.
Designed a high-availability cluster for improved reliability and maintainability and ensured zero downtime during the cutover of 24/7 live production assets.
Developed custom Python and Go tools for diagnostics, configuration automation, and data extraction, including reverse-engineering undocumented vendor APIs.
Architected a Linux-based (Debian) thin-client ecosystem to replace aging Windows HMIs, saving $40k+ in CAPEX and eliminating OS downtime on the factory floor.
Acted as the primary technical liaison between IT, OT, and external vendors during critical incidents, coordinating root-cause analysis (RCA) for complex system failures.
Recognized with the company wide “Be Bold” Award (2025) at the inaugural national achievement awards.

roles.title: Interim Team Leader
highlights: Led a team of 12 operators, consistently exceeding production and safety targets.

roles.title: Process Operator
highlights: Operated heavy industrial plant machinery on 12-hour rotating day/night shifts.
